text: Hannibal Amir Buress (, born February 4, 1983) is an American actor, comedian, producer and writer. He has co-starred on Adult Swim's The Eric Andre Show since 2012. He also starred on Comedy Central's Broad City from 2014 to 2019. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Chicago Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American television producers Category:American television writers Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from Chicago Category:Movie producers from Chicago Category:Screenwriters from Chicago
title: Hannibal Buress
